channel.title: Maxwell Cofie
channel.description: Thoughts on technology, design, and building products in Africa.

item.title: GatePass: The TikTok for Modern-Day Events
item.description: A reflection on why experience, energy, and short-form video now play a central role in how people discover and choose events.

item.title: My Journey to the West: Ivory Coast - Abidjan
item.description: A first-time visit to Abidjan that sparked reflections on language, mobility, mobile money, and the complexities of building and scaling digital products across Africa.

item.description: How a casual meetup led to the birth of a builder community.
